Pre-Game Insights: Ghana was expected to beat Sudan but failed to do so
James Kwasi Appiah, former Black Stars coach, was coaching Sudan for the match
Post-Match Reflections: Otto Addo, Ghana coach, expressed disappointment at the result but praised James Kwasi Appiah
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was important for Ghana as they were searching for their first win in the 2025 Afcon qualifiers
Others: The Ghana Football Association temporarily approved the use of the Accra sports stadium for the game after banning Ghana from hosting international games due to poor pitch standards
